price: Allah will judge between you on the Day of Resurrection concerning that over which you used to differ.
arabic: ٱللَّهُ يَحۡكُمُ بَيۡنَكُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ فِيمَا كُنتُمۡ فِيهِ تَخۡتَلِفُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: al-lahu yaḥkumu baynakum yawma al-qiyāmati fīmā kuntum fīhi takhtalifūna
